patthana22.14:4.1: Nakusalaṃ naniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo niyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana22.14:5.1: Nakusalaṃ naaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.14:5.2: Naakusalaṃ naaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.14:5.3: Naabyākataṃ naaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.14:5.4: Nakusalaṃ naaniyatañca naabyākataṃ naaniyatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.14:5.5: Naakusalaṃ naaniyatañca naabyākataṃ naaniyatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.14:5.7: Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
